document.full_text: osama bin laden's longtime lieutenant, ayman al-zawahri, said the united states faces rebellion throughout the muslim world after killing the al qaeda leader, according to a youtube recording posted on wednesday.
document.title: bin laden will "haunt" america: al qaeda deputy
lines_and_colors: osama bin laden's longtime lieutenant, ayman al-zawahri, said the united states faces rebellion throughout the muslim world after killing the al qaeda leader, according to a youtube recording posted on wednesday.
